attributes.action: correct the manifestly unfair situation whereby troops injured between 2001 and 2005 are compensated at a significantly lower level than those injured after 2005.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Troops injured in conflict between 2001 and 2005 are currently paid significantly lower compensation than those injured after 2005. This is most unfair and is causing severe hardship and must be rectified as a matter of priority.
